posts.post_title: Addie Joss Polar Bear for trade
posts.post_content:
I'm looking for the same pose with a more common back, but I would be open to other Hofers from the t206 set or even adding money to the deal for the right card. pm or email me at [url]maxjacks89@yahoo.com[/url]
